title: Summary
content:
Iâ€™m open and positive minded, enthusiastic trustworthy and hardworking graduate focused in Computer Sciences & Mathematics from University of Ruhuna. Through hard work and team work I wish to acquire new experience and knowledge as software engineer, which would help me to improve my skills and climb the corporate ladder to possess even more challenging positions.

I believe in working hard and producing high-quality codes responsibly with next to no optimizations required. Excellent knowledge and practice in a variety of frameworks such as Spring, Angular, laravel, and languages such as Java, Javascript, Typescript and PHP.

Some of the activities I am very interested and highly skilled includes Code optimization, setting and maintaining organizational coding standards, R & D, hardware device integration and configuration.

Always look to share my expertise with the team and I am Supportive and enthusiastic team player dedicated to streamlining processes and efficiently resolving project issues by helping the team towards the goal while maintaining the quality of the product.
